instructions: Put the plate on the dinner table.
Place the dinner fork down next to the left side of the plate.
Place the salad fork down next to the left of the dinner fork.
Place the dinner knife down next to the right of the plate.
Place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife.
Place down the soup spoon next to the right of the salad knife.
Place the water glass on the top right corner of the dinner plate.
Place the wine glass directly to the right of the water glass.
Place another wine glass to the right of the other wine glass.
Place the coffee cup directly to the right of the soup spoon.
Place the bread plate on the top left corner of the dinner plate above the forks.
Place the butter knife on the bread plate on a diagonal position facing northwest.
Place the dessert fork above the dinner plate in a horizontal position.
Place a dessert spoon above the dessert fork in an opposite parallel position.
Place a napkin centered on top of the dinner plate in a vertical position.
